static member RobustScaler : Microsoft.ML.TransformsCatalog * Microsoft.ML.InputOutputColumnPair[] * bool * bool * single * single -> Microsoft.ML.Featurizers.RobustScalerEstimator

Docs.param: The lower bound to keep. Values range from 0 to 100.0. Must be lower then the
The upper bound to keep. Values range from 0 to 100.0. Must be greater then the
Docs.summary: Creates a which scales features using statistics that are robust to outliers, by removing the median and scaling the data according to the quantile range (defaults to IQR: Interquartile Range). Centering and scaling happen independently on each feature by computing the relevant statistics on the samples in the training set. Median and interquartile range are then stored to be used on later data using the transform method.

Docs.summary: Creates a which scales features using statistics that are robust to outliers, by removing the median and scaling the data according to the quantile range (defaults to IQR: Interquartile Range). Centering and scaling happen independently on each feature by computing the relevant statistics on the samples in the training set. Median and interquartile range are then stored to be used on later data using the transform method.
